thread.title: Twins GM Ryan already looking forward to 2016

title: Twins GM Ryan already looking forward to 2016
text:
Twins GM Ryan already looking forward to 2016 After finally breaking a bad string of losing seasons, the Minnesota Twins are hopeful about the future. Post to Facebook Twins GM Ryan already looking forward to 2016 After finally breaking a bad string of losing seasons, the Minnesota Twins are hopeful about the future.  //www.kare11.com/story/sports/mlb/twins/2015/10/21/twins-gm-ryan-already-looking-forward-to-2016/74370398/   Join the Conversation To   Twins GM Ryan already looking forward to 2016 Perk talks with Terry Ryan KARE KARE 11 Staff, KARE 11:51 p.m. EDT October 21, 2015 After finally breaking a bad string of losing seasons, the Minnesota Twins are hopeful about the future. (Photo: KARE 11) 1 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
MINNEAPOLIS - After finally breaking a bad string of losing seasons, the Minnesota Twins are hopeful about the future. 
Still, they'd much prefer being one of the teams battling away in the postseason. Instead though, General Manager Terry Ryan is concerning himself with trimming his roster, arbitration, Arizona Fall League, free agency, and the Major League Winter Meetings. 
KARE 11 Sports Director Eric Perkins caught up with Ryan in the midst of this already busy offseason and got his take on this past season, and the ones ahead.
